notes.fixed_vs_variable: This profile contains ONLY fixed physical characteristics. Variable traits like hairstyle (up/down/braided), makeup level (minimal/moderate/glam), tan level (golden/deep bronze), and outfit are specified per-generation, NOT in this profile.
notes.purpose: Identity reference for consistent person generation across all content
notes.compared_to_savannah: More striking face, bigger chest (D vs C), more prominent glutes, deeper baseline tan, more extreme hourglass, taller/longer legs, more Instagram model aesthetic
